author: Rhia D
title: location ! fantastic hotel
text:
This is our second time to be in this hotel.This time we stayed for 11 days (January 27-Feb.9) . Its a small Parisian hotel in a heart of Paris.This is one of the best location as well. You are walking distance to Eiffel Tower ,Arc de Triomph and other historic sites.Staff are very friendly .
close to many restaurants and shopping.
We will come back again in summertime .
We request for a taxi to take us to the airport and They arranged it for us without hesitation.
